author: noblesavage
title: My boy's favorite set!
review: My 4-year old loves this set. On sale for $14.98 USD at "Shop at Home" it's a steal! I actually purchased this as an impulse buy, as my main purchase was the Duplo Fire Truck ($29.99 USD) that I regreted not buying for him at the Disney Lego Store. But this one turned out to be his favorite... go figure!
